XHEADER.Title: Deploy and Activate Java EE Application

param.name: XC_P01
param.value: Start after application deployment = NO, do not start application

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
!Common Variables :SET &CONFIGURE_OBJECT# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_SOA.PUB.VARA.DOMAIN_CONFIGURATIONS"; :SET &FILL_OUT_MESSAGE# = "&CONFIGURE_OBJECT# object" :SET &ENVIRONMENT# = "&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_ENVIRONMENT#"
!----------------------- Admin Server Host -----------------------! :SET &XPATH# = '//domains/domain[@name="&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_DOMAIN#"]/machines/machine/admin-server/@host' :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_SOA.PRV.INCLUDE.GET_VALUE_AND_VALIDATE_XPATH &OUPUT# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_HOST# !----------------------- Admin Server Port -----------------------! :SET &XPATH# = '//domains/domain[@name="&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_DOMAIN#"]/machines/machine/admin-server/@port' :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_SOA.PRV.INCLUDE.GET_VALUE_AND_VALIDATE_XPATH &OUPUT# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PORT# !----------------------- Admin Server Protocol -----------------------! :SET &XPATH# = '//domains/domain[@name="&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_DOMAIN#"]/machines/machine/admin-server/@connection-protocol' :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_SOA.PRV.INCLUDE.GET_VALUE_AND_VALIDATE_XPATH &OUPUT# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USE_PROTOCOL#
!----------------------- Weblogic Home -----------------------! :SET &XPATH# = '//domains/domain[@name="&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_DOMAIN#"]/machines/machine/admin-server/../@webLogicHome' :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_SOA.PRV.INCLUDE.GET_VALUE_AND_VALIDATE_XPATH &OUPUT# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_HOME# !----------------------- Java Option -----------------------! :SET &XPATH# = '//domains/domain[@name="&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_DOMAIN#"]/global-settings/global-setting[@name="java-options"]/@value' :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_SOA.PRV.INCLUDE.GET_VALUE_XPATH &OUPUT# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_JAVA_OPTIONS# !----------------------- Agent of Admin Server -----------------------! :SET &XPATH# = '//domains/domain[@name="&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_DOMAIN#"]/machines/machine/admin-server/../agent/@name' :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_SOA.PRV.INCLUDE.GET_VALUE_AND_VALIDATE_XPATH &OUPUT# = &UC4RB_ADMIN_SERVER_AGENT# !----------------------- Login of Admin Server -----------------------! :SET &XPATH# = '//domains/domain[@name="&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_DOMAIN#"]/machines/machine/admin-server/../agent/@login' :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_SOA.PRV.INCLUDE.GET_VALUE_AND_VALIDATE_XPATH &OUPUT# = &UC4RB_ADMIN_SERVER_LOGIN#
:SET &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PLAN_PATH# = "&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PLAN_DIR#/&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PLAN_NAME#" :IF &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PLAN_PATH# <> "/" : SET &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CREATE_PLAN# = "NO" :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PLAN_PATH# = "" : SET &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CREATE_PLAN# = "YES" :ENDIF :PUBLISH &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PLAN_PATH#,,"WORKFLOW" :PUBLISH &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CREATE_PLAN#,,"WORKFLOW"
!Servers/Cluster :IF &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_DOMAIN_CLUSTER# = "Cluster" : SET &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TARGETS# = "&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CLUSTER#" :ELSE : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR_XML(&CONFIGURE_OBJECT#, &ENVIRONMENT#, '//domains/domain[@name="&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_DOMAIN#"]/clusters/cluster/@name') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : IF &VALUE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TARGETS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TARGETS#, "&VALUE#,") : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ENDIF :PUBLISH &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TARGETS#,,"WORKFLOW" ! :P "Admin Server Host = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_HOST#" ! :P "Admin Server Port = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PORT#" ! :P "Admin Server Protocol = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_USE_PROTOCOL#" ! :P "Weblogic Home = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_HOME#" ! :P "Java Option = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_JAVA_OPTIONS#" ! :P "Agent of Admin Server = &UC4RB_ADMIN_SERVER_AGENT#" ! :P "Login of Admin Server = &UC4RB_ADMIN_SERVER_LOGIN#" ! :P "Plan path = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PLAN_PATH#" ! :P "Create path = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CREATE_PLAN#"
